#include<stdio.h>
int main(void)
{
    char ch='a';
    while(ch!='\n')
    {
    scanf("%c",&ch);
    if(ch=='a' || ch=='e' || ch=='i' || ch=='o' || ch=='u' )               
    { 
      scanf("%c",&ch);
      scanf("%c",&ch);
    }            
    printf("%c",ch);             
    }    
    return 0;
}
